divs: Sighting DetailsI WOKE UP WENT TO THE BATHROOM AND AS I DO EVERY MORNING I LOOKED AT THE CLOCK.I HEARD MY DOGS BARKING AND WHEN I OPENED THE DOOR TO TELL THEM TO SHUT UP I NOTICED ALL THE DOGS AROUND MY HOUSE WERE BARKING.THEN I COULD FEEL MORE THAN HEAR A LOW HUM.I LOOKED AROUND IN THE PASTURE NEXT TO MY HOUSE WAS THE SAME TRANGLE THAT I HAVE SEEN SEVERAL TIMES.THIS TIME THERE WERE SHORT FLASHES OF BRIGHT BLUEISHWHITE LIGHT .ITS WAS MOVING NORTH VERY SLOW,I WATCHED IT FOR ABOUT TWO MIN. IT WAS COLD AND I HAD NO SHOES ON SO I CAME BACK IN AND CHALED IT UP TO A NUMBER OF SIGHTINGS OF THE SAME CRAFT.IT WAS ABOUT 400 FEET OFF THE GROUND AND ABOUT 50 YRDS AWAY.THE FLASHES WENT ON 5 TIMES AND STOPED.
